verses.verse: And if his oblation<WH7133> be a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offering<WH8002>, if he offer<WH7126> it of the herd<WH1241>; whether it be a male<WH2145> or female<WH5347>, he shall offer<WH7126> it outside blemish<WH8549> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>.

And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of his offering<WH7133>, and kill<WH7819> it at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>: and Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> the priests<WH3548> shall sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> upon the altar<WH4196> round about<WH5439>.

And he shall offer<WH7126> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of the peace offering<WH8002> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>; the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the inwards<WH7130>, and all the fat<WH2459> that is upon the inwards<WH7130>,

And the two<WH8147> kidneys<WH3629>, and the fat<WH2459> that is on them<WH3689>, which is by the flanks, and the membrane<WH3508> above the liver<WH3516>, with the kidneys<WH3629>, it shall he take away<WH5493>.

And Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> shall burn<WH6999> it on the altar<WH4196> upon the burnt sacrifice<WH5930>, which is upon the wood<WH6086> that is on the fire<WH784>: it is an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>.

And if his offering<WH7133> for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offering<WH8002> unto the Lord<WH3068> be of the flock<WH6629>; male<WH2145> or female<WH5347>, he shall offer<WH7126> it outside blemish<WH8549>.
If he offer<WH7126> a lamb<WH3775> for his offering<WH7133>, then shall he offer<WH7126> it before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>.

And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of his offering<WH7133>, and kill<WH7819> it before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>: and Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> shall sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> there round about<WH5439> upon the altar<WH4196>.

And he shall offer<WH7126> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of the peace offering<WH8002> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>; the fat<WH2459> there<WH8549>, and the whole rump<WH451>, it shall he take off<WH5493> hard<WH5980> by the backbone<WH6096>; and the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the inwards<WH7130>, and all the fat<WH2459> that is upon the inwards<WH7130>,

And the two<WH8147> kidneys<WH3629>, and the fat<WH2459> that is upon them<WH3689>, which is by the flanks, and the membrane<WH3508> above the liver<WH3516>, with the kidneys<WH3629>, it shall he take away<WH5493>.
And the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> it upon the altar<WH4196>: it is the food<WH3899> of the offering made by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>.
And if his offering<WH7133> be a goat<WH5795>, then he shall offer<WH7126> it before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>.

And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of it<WH7819>, and kill it before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>: and the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> shall sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> there upon the altar<WH4196> round about<WH5439>.

And he shall offer<WH7126> there his offering<WH7133>, even an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>; the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the inwards<WH7130>, and all the fat<WH2459> that is upon the inwards<WH7130>,

And the two<WH8147> kidneys<WH3629>, and the fat<WH2459> that is upon them<WH3689>, which is by the flanks, and the membrane<WH3508> above the liver<WH3516>, with the kidneys<WH3629>, it shall he take away<WH5493>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them upon the altar<WH4196>: it is the food<WH3899> of the offering made by fire<WH801> for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381>: all the fat<WH2459> is the Lord<WH3068>'s.
It shall be a perpetual<WH5769> statute<WH2708> for your generations<WH1755> throughout all your dwellings<WH4186>, that you eat<WH398> neither fat<WH2459> nor blood<WH1818>.
